noPerms: You don't have permission to do that.
noReason: Please provide a reaon when rejecting a post.
noId: Couldn't find any post matching the id
noMeme: Meme does not exist. The meme might have been removed
bioLong: Bio must be less than 200 characters
reportBug: Please join, https://discord.gg/ZJ2jm4x and report the bug
noImg: Please provide an attachment, or url of an image.
imgError: An error occured while uploading image to database! Please make sure you are uploading an image/gif/video, and not something else.
error: Unexpected error occured. This shouldn't happen, please join https://discord.gg/ZJ2jm4x and report the bug.
